short_summary: TemporaryHelp Services Requirement for the National Capital Region
description: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
**Temporary Help Services Requirement**
=====================================================

**Publication Information**
------------------------

*   Solicitation Number: S4551970
*   Amendment Number: 5
*   Publication Date: October 18, 2023
*   Closing Date: October 27, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: October 27, 2023

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Description**
-----------------------------------------

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services, and this RFP is issued to Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified in the Stream 5 - Computer Services categories, specifically category 5.1 Computer and Application Support.

**Eligible Bidders**
-------------------

The following Supply Arrangement Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

1.  ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp
2.  Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
3.  Axons Canada Inc. and Levio Conseils Inc. (Joint Venture)
4.  AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
5.  CyberVisor Corporation
6.  HubSpoke Inc.
7.  IBISKA Telecom Inc.
8.  MAKWA Resourcing Inc.
9.  MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
10. Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
11. Olav Consulting Corp
12. TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
13. Tech4Soft Inc. and Expertise Technology Consulting Inc. (Joint Venture)
14. TRM Technologies Inc.
15. Valcom Consulting Group Inc.

**Security Requirements**
------------------------

The selected Resource(s) must meet the Enhanced Reliability Security Level.

**Important Documents**
----------------------

Please find the complete RFP package here: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/22488/s4551970---rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/22488/s4551970---rfp.pdf)

**Pre-Proposal Meeting**
-----------------------

A pre-proposal meeting is not scheduled.

**Bid Submission**
-----------------

Submissions must be received by the closing date indicated above.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at (613) 971-7955 or send an email to [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemp
